title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When trying to synchronize a .java file with another resource (such as a .properties file) in the package viewer, the synchronization process fails.
OB: When selecting a .java file and another resource in the package viewer, and attempting to synchronize them, the synchronization process does not complete successfully.
EB: When selecting a .java file and another resource in the package viewer, and attempting to synchronize them, the synchronization should complete successfully.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the package viewer. 
2. Select a .java file and another resource (such as a .properties file) in the package viewer.
3. Attempt to synchronize the selected files.
